verbs.description: Through a secretive shell company , the president ’s personal lawyer [V: was] paid by major corporations and a law firm for help navigating Washington in the Trump era .

[ARGM-MNR: Through a secretive shell company] , [ARG2: the president ’s personal lawyer] was [V: paid] [ARG0: by major corporations and a law firm] [ARG3: for help navigating Washington in the Trump era] .
